quizDescription: Test your knowledge of video games with this exciting trivia quiz!
quizTags: Video Games, Gaming, Characters, History, Pop Culture

questions.question: In the game 'Minecraft,' what material is used to craft torches?
questions.explanation: In 'Minecraft,' torches are crafted using coal, which provides light in the game.

questions.question: Which character is known as the 'Blue Blur' and is the mascot of Sega?
questions.explanation: Sonic the Hedgehog is known as the 'Blue Blur' and is the iconic mascot of Sega.

questions.question: What is the main objective of the game 'Fortnite'?
questions.explanation: In 'Fortnite,' the main objective is to be the last player or team surviving in the Battle Royale mode.

questions.question: Which video game series features a time-traveling protagonist named Link?
questions.explanation: The video game series 'The Legend of Zelda' features the protagonist Link, who embarks on time-traveling adventures.

questions.question: In the game 'Pokémon GO,' what is the goal of players?
options: Catch Pokémon in the real world
questions.answer: Catch Pokémon in the real world
questions.explanation: In 'Pokémon GO,' players use augmented reality to catch Pokémon in the real world using their mobile devices.

questions.question: Which video game franchise features a plumber named Mario?
questions.explanation: The 'Super Mario' franchise features a plumber named Mario, created by Nintendo.

questions.question: In the game 'Overwatch,' how many players are there on each team?
questions.explanation: In 'Overwatch,' each team consists of 6 players, each playing a unique hero with different abilities.

questions.question: Which video game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where players must survive against zombies?
questions.explanation: 'The Last of Us' is set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with infected humans and emphasizes survival and emotional storytelling.

questions.question: In the game 'League of Legends,' how many players are there on each team?
questions.explanation: In 'League of Legends,' each team consists of 5 players, each controlling a champion with unique abilities.

questions.question: Which popular video game features a building and survival gameplay set in a blocky world?
questions.explanation: 'Minecraft' is a popular video game that allows players to build and explore a blocky, procedurally-generated world.

questions.question: Which video game franchise features a fantasy world called Azeroth and various playable races?
questions.explanation: 'World of Warcraft' is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) set in the fantasy world of Azeroth.

questions.question: Which gaming console was released by Sony and became highly successful in the 1990s?
questions.explanation: The 'PlayStation' gaming console, released by Sony, became highly successful in the 1990s and beyond.

questions.question: In the 'Super Smash Bros.' series, which character is known for swallowing opponents and copying their abilities?
questions.explanation: In the 'Super Smash Bros.' series, Kirby is known for swallowing opponents and copying their abilities.

questions.question: Which iconic video game character collects rings and battles against the villain Dr. Robotnik?
questions.explanation: Sonic the Hedgehog collects rings and battles against the villain Dr. Robotnik (also known as Dr. Eggman).

questions.question: What is the name of the virtual world created by a brilliant game designer in the novel 'Ready Player One'?
questions.explanation: In the novel 'Ready Player One' by Ernest Cline, the virtual world created by a brilliant game designer is called Oasis.
